content: Added memory tracking stats for SLIM.

Improves property access performance in Luau `--!native` code for `Vector2`, `CFrame`, `RaycastResult`, `UDim`, `Color3`, and `NumberRange` type values when locals are properly type-annotated. This can make property access performance up to 20x faster.
Adds `math.isnan`, `math.isinf` and `math.isfinite` functions based on the Luau [math.isnan, math.isinf and math.isfinite for Math Library](https://rfcs.luau.org/math-isnan-isfinite-isinf.html) RFC.

In the New Luau Type Solver, generic user-defined type functions now infer types more consistently. Previously, constraints involving generic UDTFs could be incorrectly forced, causing type inference to give inconsistent results.
Updates the default `ScriptEditor` font to Builder Mono. Font size is now 12 for MacOS.
Fixes the UV scaling for wedge model textures.
Fixes the link in warning pop-up regarding unsupported graphics configurations.
Fixes a bug that caused `Axes.new` to fail to type check when valid arguments were passed in.
Reparenting a `Class.ViewportFrame` to `nil` and back no longer stops the `ViewportFrame` from rendering.
Fixes a rare script analysis crash in Studio.
Improves the Acoustic Simulation feature's pathfinding in wide-open spaces.
Fixes an issue where creating or destroying a `HapticEffect` inside a non-deferred Lua signal could lead to a crash.
In the New Luau Type Solver, type refinements resulting from comparisons are now more consistent, and should result in less inferences of `any`.
